module.name: behaviour_identification_and_version
module.keywords: module, behaviour, behaviour identification, behaviour version, system engineering

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identify behaviours and their versions.

inscope.li: identification of a version of a behaviour.

outscope.li: representation of the behaviour or its versions.
